column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The bread is warm
column2: home made and accompanied by creamy butter. We shared the goat cheese appetizer which reminded me of dipping my bread in my mom's pasta sauce as a kid.  I am not a steak eater
column3: so I cannot comment on the meat
column4: however my date said it was one of the best steaks he's had. The salmon was cooked to perfection. For sides we ordered the corn and creamed spinach.  The spinach was awesome. The corn was good
column5: but nothing I got excited about.
